duration.description: Duration of GW signal. Defined only for the burst class of events.

central_frequency.description: Peak frequency of GW signal in Hz. Defined only for the burst class of events.

pipeline.description: The pipeline used to process the triggers.

search.description: The search method used for the GW event.

group.description: The class of GW trigger: CBC or Burst.

significant.description: Whether the far is above a certain threshold.

anyOf.description: Coincidence with a non-GW event sent through GCN.

gcn_notice_id.description: ID used by GCN to identify external event.

observatory.description: The mission which detected the external event.

search.description: The search method used to find the external event.

time_difference.description: Time between GW source and external event [secs]

time_coincidence_far.description: Estimated coincidence false alarm rate using just timing [Hz]

time_sky_position_coincidence_far.description: Estimated coincidence false alarm rate using timing and sky position [Hz]

combined_skymap.description: The GW skymap and the external coincidence skymap combined in a multi-order FITS file as a Base64-encoded string.
